item.description: Demonstration at Newt Gingrich's Boston Event WARNING: NO RON PAUL PARAPHERNALIA ALLOWED! Whether we'd like to admit it or not, the mainstream media is telling us that Newt Gingrinch has surged to top-tier candidate status. We need to show up and inform his conservative supporters that he is a big-government Republican. I propose we wave anti-Net signs outside his Boston event this Friday, and then try to ask him difficult questions at his Q&A. PLEASE, DO NOT BRING RON PAUL STUFF; this will be a Newt protest. I suggest we wave signs from 4-6ish and then try to get into his forum. Please make/bring your own signs. If you need sign ideas or don't think that Newt is a legitimate threat I suggest you visit this site: http://www.ronpaulfor... (member of CFR, voted for dept of education, voted for NAFTA, super interventionist, flip-flopped on torture, pushed school prayer amendment, supported Romneycare, said he'd bypass supreme court, want more foreign aid for Egypt, made climate change commercial with pelosi) I think I'll try to make a handout summarizing his these positions Here are some specific details about his visit: Newt and Callista screen A City Upon a Hill at Harvard University's Institute of Politics Friday, November 18, 2011 5:00 pm - Screening 6:00 pm - Forum and Q&A Session 7:15 pm - Book Signing Harvard Institute of Politics 79 John F. Kennedy Street Cambridge, MA 02138 http://www.newt.org/e... REMEMBER, NO RON PAUL STUFF!!
item.name: Demonstration at Newt Gingrich's Boston Event
